text: In the state of nature profit is the measure of right.
author: Thomas Hobbes

text: I plead for conservation of human culture, which is much more fragile than nature herself. We needn't destroy other cultures with the force of our own.
author: Arthur Erickson

text: I love romantic comedies. They're for me the easiest thing to do and the most natural to do. There's nothing natural about holding an uzi hanging out of a moving van shooting at people. That's not second nature to me, thank God.
author: Gabrielle Union

text: No phenomenon can be isolated, but has repercussions through every aspect of our lives. We are learning that we are a fundamental part of nature's ecosystems.
author: Arthur Erickson

text: There is little doubt that we are in the midst of a revolution of a much more profound and fundamental nature than the social and political revolutions of the last half century.
author: Arthur Erickson
